participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative, expressive, and caring. Loves to share joy with friends and values protecting loved ones.
participant_1.background: I drink a lot of juice and yogurt to make up for my lack of vegetables. I need to figure out how to satisfy my hunger and continue teaching my students. I'd like to be reincarnated as a dragon, so I could continue to protect my friends and fight for what is right. I like to dress up to express my personality and creativity. I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends by listening to Taylor Swift's music and eating my favorite foods.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Sporty, laid-back, and adventurous. Enjoys socializing with friends and has a strong connection to physical activities.
participant_2.background: I had a party with my friends and we played arm wrestling. I watch basketball. My mom went crazy when I was three and I have not seen her since. My laundry schedule is based on the amount of running I do that week. Unfortunately, my family lives across the country from me.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just got home from running. How was your day?
It was good! I celebrated my birthday with my family and friends.
Wow, happy birthday! What did you do for your birthday?
We listened to Taylor Swift's music and ate my favorite foods.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I had a lot of cake.
I bet you did! I love cake.
Me too! What's your favorite kind of cake?
I like chocolate cake with chocolate frosting.
Me too! That's my favorite too.
It's the best! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to dress up to express my personality and creativity.
That sounds like fun! I like to watch basketball.
I've never been much of a sports person.
I know, you're more of a creative person.
That's right! I like to make things.
Me too! I love to make things with my hands.
That's awesome! I love to make jewelry.
That's so cool! I've never been able to make jewelry.
It's not that hard. You just need some beads and string.
I'll have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will! I'm sure I'll be terrible at it, but I'll try.
You won't be terrible! You'll be great.
Thanks for the encouragement
